about_the_game:
Virtual Hearts is a cozy short romance story where you play as Bella, a young adult who finds a computer in someone's garbage and decides to take it home.

💖 Memory Mini-Game 💖

Engage with cute and fun memory mini-games to earn points that unlock premium choices

💖 Chat Mechanic💖

Chat with the characters and make decisions that determine the outcome of your relationships. Text, flirt, and uncover secrets with each love interest.

💖 Meet Your 3 Love Interests💖

Aiden, the Charming executive – A charismatic man with a strategic mind, what's behind his sweet words?

Caden, the rude detective– A rude boy on the outside, but what lies beneath? Discover his true nature as you get to know him

Ethan, the mysterious private spy – Ethan is a tormented soul who lives only to fulfill the missions assigned by his employers. Can you break down his walls and show him the power of kindness?

💖 Multiple Endings💖

Your choices matter! Explore different paths with each character and unlock sweet moments or bittersweet goodbyes.

content_descriptors.notes: This game might include slightly sexual themes, nothing explicit

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (Intel HD 4000 or newer, or Apple M1 GPU)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or M2, or Intel Core i5 (4 cores) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (AMD Radeon or Apple GPU) with 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

Recommended:

short_description: After taking a pc from someone's garbage, a girl discovers she can chat with handsome guys every day, but something is not quite right about it. Reveal the secrets behind this game, unlock all endings, solve memory games to gain points, and make the best decisions in this short romance story.
